Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market. Information about the party submitting the qualification. A placeholder for the data related to only one Economic Operator (EO) that tenders solely to a procurement project, to one of the EOs that tender as part of a group (e.g. a Consortium), or to one possible sub-contractor of the EO. Consortia grouping more than one EO need to draft and submit as many ESPDResponses as Economic Operators and sub-contractors participate in the tender.

Element.Name: SME indicator
Element.Description: Indicates whether the economic operator can be categorized as an SME (true) or not.According to the EC, SME are enterprises with less than 250 employees, a turnover less than EUR 50 m and a balance sheet total less than EUR 43 m.

Element.Name: Representative Natural person
Element.Description: Information about individuals who in one way or the other represent the economic operator.

Element.Name: Role description
Element.Description: A short description for the role of the Economic Operatorâ€™s representative

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: Country of registration of the natural person

Element.Name: Representative Natural person
Element.Description: Information about individuals who in one way or the other represent the economic operator.

Element.Name: Representative natural person first name
Element.Description: First name of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person first name
Element.Description: First name of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person birth date
Element.Description: Birth date of the natural person. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Representative natural person birth place
Element.Description: Birth place of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person contact information
Element.Description: Information about contact details for the representative natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person telephone
Element.Description: Telephone number to the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person e-mail address
Element.Description: E-mail address to the natural person.

Element.Name: Postbox
Element.Description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery by a postal service provider.

Element.Name: Representative natural person street address
Element.Description: Street address to the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person city
Element.Description: City of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person postal zone
Element.Description: Postal zone or zip code of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person country
Element.Description: Country of the natural person.

Element.Name: Representative natural person country code
Element.Description: Country code of the natural person.

Element.Name: Economic operator website
Element.Description: The website of the economic operator.
Unique identification number for the Economic Operator

Attribute.Description: The schemeID attribute specifies if it is a VAT number or another national number. The possible values are: VAT_Number and National_Number.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The official name of the Economic Operator, as registered in a Business Register

Element.Name: Economic operator postal address
Element.Description: The address of the Economic Operator, as registered in a Business Register

Element.Name: Postbox
Element.Description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery by a postal service provider.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address. Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.
